trends: There have been 97 other sightings in Miami
There were no other sightings in Miami on or around September 20th 2000
divs: Sighting Detailsmy fishing buddy and I went fishing to the seven mile bridge on the fla. keys north side, the weather was real bad, light rain and windy everybody left except my buddy a chinese couple from newyork on ther honeymoon and myself, i quit fishing because nothing was biting and turned around facing the highway and at eleven twenty exactly my buddy called me and said look at that so I did, there I was facing a fairly large disc I could see most of its underbelly it was dull orange, it stood there for exactly three minutes and then flew south stopped by the south side of the bridge and then I saw like rectangular plates coming down one on top of the other forming like a screw then again it took off south. next morning I was listening to the cuban radio and the govermente there were informing that their airforce was following these objects for several hours. as you know cuba is just 090 miles from the keys.
